catalog_ui_policy.short_description: Hide Payroll Info in RITM and Task
catalog_ui_policy.sys_name: Hide Payroll Info in RITM and Task

sys_update_version.name: catalog_ui_policy_092618191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbca
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>false</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions/><catalog_item display_value="Employee Termination">b7f598d51b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcb9f</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>1000</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	var payrollFields = ['date_final_check_is_needed', 'eligible_for_rehire', 'if_car_allowance_enter_car_allowance_amount','last_known_personal_phone_number', 'last_known_mailing_address', 'final_hours_worked_o_t', 'type_of_separation', 'final_check_given_to_employee_per_that_specific_state_s_regulations', 'last_4_numbers_of_ssn', 'send_check_to', 'final_hours_vacation', 'employee_type', 'voluntary', 'final_hours_severance', 'car_allowance_amount_to_be_paid_is_confirmed_if_applicable', 'final_hours_worked_d_t', 'final_check_given_to_employee_per_that_specific_state_s_regulations', 'last_4_numbers_of_ssn', 'send_check_to','final_hours_worked_clock','final_expense_report_is_received_reviewed_and_approved_if_applicable','benefits_contact_form_provided_to_non_union_employees'];
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	//Specialty Services
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	gr.addQuery('user', userID);
	gr.addQuery('group', '0de9f4781bcf7414df31da49cc4bcbe6');//AG_SegmentSpecialtyServicesPayroll
	gr.query();

	var gr1 = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	gr1.addQuery('user', userID);
	gr1.addQuery('group', '58a0d63b1bfa2414df31da49cc4bcb2a');//AG_Segment-SafetyServices-Payroll
	gr1.query();
	
	var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	gr2.addQuery('user', userID);
	gr2.addQuery('group', 'ba0aca2e1bb4e810df31da49cc4bcba7');//AG_PayrollAdministrationSupportServices
	gr2.query();
	
	if(!gr.hasNext() && !gr1.hasNext() && !gr2.hasNext()){
		for(i=0;i<payrollFields.length;i++){
			g_form.setVisible(payrollFields[i],false);
		}
		g_form.setSectionDisplay('payroll', false);
	}
	else{
		for(i=0;i<payrollFields.length;i++){
			g_form.setVisible(payrollFields[i],true);
		}
		g_form.setSectionDisplay('payroll', true);
	}
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	var payrollFields = ['date_final_check_is_needed', 'eligible_for_rehire', 'if_car_allowance_enter_car_allowance_amount','last_known_personal_phone_number', 'last_known_mailing_address', 'final_hours_worked_o_t', 'type_of_separation', 'final_check_given_to_employee_per_that_specific_state_s_regulations', 'last_4_numbers_of_ssn', 'send_check_to', 'final_hours_vacation', 'employee_type', 'voluntary', 'final_hours_severance', 'car_allowance_amount_to_be_paid_is_confirmed_if_applicable', 'final_hours_worked_d_t', 'final_check_given_to_employee_per_that_specific_state_s_regulations', 'last_4_numbers_of_ssn', 'send_check_to','final_hours_worked_clock','final_expense_report_is_received_reviewed_and_approved_if_applicable','benefits_contact_form_provided_to_non_union_employees'];
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	//Specialty Services
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	gr.addQuery('user', userID);
	gr.addQuery('group', '0de9f4781bcf7414df31da49cc4bcbe6');//AG_SegmentSpecialtyServicesPayroll
	gr.query();

	var gr1 = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	gr1.addQuery('user', userID);
	gr1.addQuery('group', '58a0d63b1bfa2414df31da49cc4bcb2a');//AG_Segment-SafetyServices-Payroll
	gr1.query();
	
	var gr2 = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	gr2.addQuery('user', userID);
	gr2.addQuery('group', 'ba0aca2e1bb4e810df31da49cc4bcba7');//AG_PayrollAdministrationSupportServices
	gr2.query();
	
	if(!gr.hasNext() && !gr1.hasNext() && !gr2.hasNext()){
		for(i=0;i<payrollFields.length;i++){
			g_form.setVisible(payrollFields[i],false);
		}
		g_form.setSectionDisplay('payroll', false);
	}
	else{
		for(i=0;i<payrollFields.length;i++){
			g_form.setVisible(payrollFields[i],true);
		}
		g_form.setSectionDisplay('payroll', true);
	}
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Hide Payroll Info in RITM and Task</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-06 14:33:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>092618191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide Payroll Info in RITM and Task</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Termination Process Core">c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_092618191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 14:33:14</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
